fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article (Farage’s milkshake attacker is ordered to pay suit cleaning bill, 19 June, page 20) reported that the defendant “was told to pay £350 in compensation to Nigel Farage to fund the cost of cleaning his suit”. To clarify: the elements of that sum included cleaning and £239 for damage to a lapel microphone, distress and inconvenience. • Other recently corrected articles include: Serpentine Pavilion 2019: Japan’s great conjuror falls foul of health and safety Legal aid cuts harming discrimination victims, says equality watchdog
